price: 30 Loth implora : « Venge-moi, Seigneur, de ce peuple livré au péché. »
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرۡنِي عَلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi unṣur'nī ʿalā al-qawmi al-muf'sidīna
